permissions: Allowed if the user can access labor requirements within job production plans permitted by CrewRequirementPolicy scope (non-admins limited to job production plans in their policy scope).
side_effects: Read-only: fetches labor requirements from the API.
validation_notes: --resource-classification-id requires --resource-classification-type. --resource-id requires --resource-type. Boolean filters must be true or false where indicated. Date/time filters must be valid ISO 8601 timestamps; effective date filters must be YYYY-MM-DD. --is-assignment-candidate-for must be a single, valid laborer ID.

flags.name: --job-production-plan
flags.description: Filter by job production plan ID

flags.name: --resource-classification-type
flags.description: Filter by resource classification type (e.g., LaborClassification)

flags.name: --resource-classification-id
flags.description: Filter by resource classification ID (use with --resource-classification-type)

flags.name: --not-resource-classification-type
flags.description: Exclude resource classification type

flags.name: --resource-type
flags.description: Filter by resource type (e.g., Laborer)

flags.name: --resource-id
flags.description: Filter by resource ID (use with --resource-type)

flags.name: --not-resource-type
flags.description: Exclude resource type

flags.name: --broker
flags.description: Filter by broker ID

flags.name: --customer
flags.description: Filter by customer ID

flags.name: --project-manager
flags.description: Filter by project manager user ID

flags.name: --project
flags.description: Filter by project ID

flags.name: --has-resource
flags.description: Filter by assignment status (true/false)

flags.name: --start-at-min
flags.description: Filter by minimum start time (ISO 8601)

flags.name: --start-at-max
flags.description: Filter by maximum start time (ISO 8601)

flags.name: --is-start-at
flags.description: Filter by presence of start time (true/false)

flags.name: --end-at-min
flags.description: Filter by minimum end time (ISO 8601)

flags.name: --end-at-max
flags.description: Filter by maximum end time (ISO 8601)

flags.name: --is-end-at
flags.description: Filter by presence of end time (true/false)

flags.name: --is-only-for-equipment-movement
flags.description: Filter by equipment-movement-only plans (true/false)

flags.name: --start-at-effective-min
flags.description: Filter by minimum effective start time (ISO 8601)

flags.name: --start-at-effective-max
flags.description: Filter by maximum effective start time (ISO 8601)

flags.name: --end-at-effective-min
flags.description: Filter by minimum effective end time (ISO 8601)

flags.name: --end-at-effective-max
flags.description: Filter by maximum effective end time (ISO 8601)

flags.name: --start-on-effective-min
flags.description: Filter by minimum effective start date (YYYY-MM-DD)

flags.name: --start-on-effective-max
flags.description: Filter by maximum effective start date (YYYY-MM-DD)

flags.name: --calculated-mobilization-method
flags.description: Filter by calculated mobilization method

flags.name: --job-production-plan-status
flags.description: Filter by job production plan status

flags.name: --labor-requirement
flags.description: Filter by labor requirement ID

flags.name: --labor-requirement-laborer
flags.description: Filter by labor requirement laborer ID

flags.name: --labor-requirement-laborer-id
flags.description: Filter by labor requirement laborer ID (via labor requirement)

flags.name: --labor-requirement-user
flags.description: Filter by labor requirement user ID

flags.name: --labor-requirement-user-id
flags.description: Filter by labor requirement user ID (via labor requirement)

flags.name: --requires-inbound-movement
flags.description: Filter by inbound movement requirement (true/false)

flags.name: --requires-outbound-movement
flags.description: Filter by outbound movement requirement (true/false)

flags.name: --without-approved-time-sheet
flags.description: Filter by missing approved time sheet (true/false)

flags.name: --without-submitted-time-sheet
flags.description: Filter by missing submitted time sheet (true/false)

flags.name: --is-expecting-time-sheet
flags.description: Filter by time sheet expectation (true/false)

flags.name: --laborer-user
flags.description: Filter by laborer user ID

flags.name: --is-assignment-candidate-for
flags.description: Filter by assignment candidate laborer ID
flags.validation: Must be a single laborer ID and reference an existing laborer.
